description: ZFS metrics as extracted by node_exporter

targets.expr:
# seems like in ZFS arc_sys_free targets MemFree, without accounting for Buffers and Cached
avg_over_time(node_memory_MemFree_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance="$instance", cluster="$cluster"}[$__interval])

panels.description: When there is no demand, result value will be 0%
panels.title: ARC hit %

targets.expr:
avg_over_time(node_zfs_arc_size{instance="$instance", cluster="$cluster"}[$__interval])
- avg_over_time(node_zfs_arc_data_size{instance="$instance", cluster="$cluster"}[$__interval])
- avg_over_time(node_zfs_arc_metadata_size{instance="$instance", cluster="$cluster"}[$__interval])
- avg_over_time(node_zfs_arc_hdr_size{instance="$instance", cluster="$cluster"}[$__interval])
- avg_over_time(node_zfs_arc_l2_hdr_size{instance="$instance", cluster="$cluster"}[$__interval])
- avg_over_time(node_zfs_arc_dnode_size{instance="$instance", cluster="$cluster"}[$__interval])
- avg_over_time(node_zfs_arc_dbuf_size{instance="$instance", cluster="$cluster"}[$__interval])
- avg_over_time(node_zfs_arc_abd_chunk_waste_size{instance="$instance", cluster="$cluster"}[$__interval])
- avg_over_time(node_zfs_arc_anon_data[$__interval])

title: ZFS ARC Statistics
